content: It's misworded, but the Global Junk Preferences button goes to the right place: TB menu > Privacy & Security > Junk.
creator: siffemoz

content:
I use Bitdefender, but it still happens with that off.

How did you turn it off? The only reliable method is to start Windows 10 in safe mode with networking enabled. Still in Windows safe mode, start Thunderbird in troubleshooting mode. Have you tried this?
creator: christ1
